showerReviews.reviewText: â€¦ gym. The gym was supposed to be sanitary, particularly the womanâ€™s locker room as you walk around the locker room to shower even in the sauna, but there was a woman there with her dog on a wreath where she obviously snuck in. We all â€¦

â€¦ my time as a guest here, Kyle and Cai are very helpful and friendly and all of the staff are also helpful and welcoming. Big gym with plenty of room and machines and equipment! Shower/locker room are clean as well. Hope to come back soon!

â€¦ Very dirty and unsafe place for health! Menâ€™s locker room is filthy and smelly, the shower area looks like public dumpster. The swimming pool always dirty and if you mistakenly sip a spoon of water you are booked for a doc visit. Montgomer â€¦

â€¦ to suffer from a lack of maintenance.  I'm tired of asking the staff to replace broken toilet seats, refill soap dispenser,   add toilet paper to all stalls, and replace mildew shower curtains. Again, this is a great location minus some â€¦
â€¦ Locker rooms and showers leave much to be desired. Wear shower shoes and maybe wash off with bleach when you get home. My advice is don't use them. â€¦

â€¦ found myself picking up trash one day - does anyone clean them? I don't think the wet areas are usable - I won't go in the sauna or the whirlpool - I swim, shower and get out of there. At $30.00 a month it's barely worth it but if you swim â€¦
â€¦ Also, the bathrooms do SMELL BAD, some genius decided to use carpet in the locker room area! Again, dude can you say mildew and stench!  I would suggest you shower at home. â€¦
Good gym facility. The bathrooms and shower stalls are not well kept or cleaned.  Many men in locker room have poor etiquette and create uncomfortable mood.
The jacuzzi is not working for a long time, they need to repair is sooner. And the men's shower rooms are dirty and mostly out of shower gel ğŸ™ƒ â€¦

showerReviews.reviewText: â€¦ 2. One stall in the men's shower was taped off and had an orange cone for many months. â€¦

â€¦ before the gym closes - no problem. Tonight though, she for some reason thought it would be a good idea to flood the drains with industrial grade bleach as a few ladies and myself were in the showers. Combine that with the steam, and I was â€¦

showerReviews.reviewText: Parking was simple at the lot on Cameron; $1 per hour. The kid pool is big, entertaining, and not too cold. 3 slides, 3 fountain things, a tot pool, and then another large area ranging from 2-3 feet. Lockers/ restrooms are kept clean; â€¦

Update (03/23): After trying out the weight room for one week straight, here are a few things Iâ€™ve noticed. Folks arenâ€™t utilizing the locker rooms and instead they pile their belongings on the floor or on machines, so thereâ€™s jackets and â€¦
Nice and quiet on a Monday morning! Places are clean. Pool are full of staff on duty. Friendly staff at the reception.

I went to the brand-new Silver Spring Aquatic Center with my eight-year-old daughter.  I was pleasantly surprised to find that they had a family changing room, as it is a challenge often for parents of the opposite gender of their child. â€¦
Excellent fitness center with lots of new equipment. Very clean facilities and a good variety of machines to use.

locations.title: Langdon Park Pool

showerReviews.reviewText: Langdon Pool is a hidden jewel, so relaxing and fun, great lifeguards. The changing facilities are terrible and the shower before entering the pool policy should be enforced.

locations.title: Long Bridge Aquatics & Fitness Center
locations.content: Long Bridge Aquatics & Fitness Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: â€¦ maintained, and comfortable to swim in, in any weather thanks to adequate heating. The changing rooms - shower, bathrooms, lockers - all proper, well maintained as well. The only thing you need to track, and this is a minor hassle, is â€¦

Bring your own locker room lock and slippers for locker room/shower areas - the floor is unfinished concrete and pretty gross. For a top notch swim facility the locker rooms and shower leave much to be desired. Pool is nice, lots of extras â€¦
â€¦ family changing /shower area.

â€¦ the older Rec Center ones I've been in previously. They have Women's and Men's, but also a space for all genders with multiple enclosed changing areas with a toilet and shower. The lockers themselves were spacious and had loops for people â€¦

â€¦ there are 15 unused lanes. It is frustrating. There's a nice hot tub and the shower facilities are great, including soap, shampoo, and conditioner dispenser. The pool is closed to the public late afternoon every weekday for swim practice.

Cons: the locker rooms need a lot of cleaning, the rusted shower curtains need to be replaced with the rust-proof ones, the air temperature in the pool areas and between the pools and locker rooms needs to be increased, the water slide â€¦
Everything is fantastic! Except maybe the shower pressure.
